Reviews.Title: Perfomance Powerhouse with Sophisticated Functionality
Reviews.Author: BottomLine
Reviews.Content: The GT-i9305 is truly a performance powerhouse. This phone is in a class of it's own, unmatched by any other to date. Why? Several reasons, the first being hardware. There are several variants of this phone, each with their own configuration of hardware. This particular model, the GT-i9305, brought them all together in one phone while adding LTE support. Like any PC running software, hardware matters most with regard to performance. That said, this is also true for smartphones as well. This particular version has a quad core CPU coupled with 2 gigs of ram. That's more than enough power 'under the hood' to handle anything you throw at it, namely the superior functionality of Android Jelly Bean v4.1.1 that comes stock.Not only does it run this operating system quite effortlessly, multitasking flawlessly along with Touchwiz is a sight to behold. The user interface is absolutely astonishing. This amazing display features a high definition 720p super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen utilizing Corning's Gorilla Glass 2. Blacks are truly 'black' and colors vibrantly 'pop' making for a beautiful viewing experience. Whether it's gaming, taking pictures, recording 1080p video, watching movies, running various apps, or surfing the web. hardware like this truly makes a huge difference in terms of quality and performance.Battery life, unless your using this all day viewing movies, videos, music, gaming..etc, it should last an entire day. However, this phone isn't short on possibilities either. If battery life is an issue, it takes all of 10 seconds to replace the battery with a fully charged spare. Another factor worth mentioning is the ability to add additional memory up to 64 gigs by mounting a micro-SD card, again, takes all of 10 seconds.I've read the negative reviews on the Galaxy s3, most of them were in regard to dropping the phone and the screen shattering. This is true for any smartphone under various conditions. Certainly accidents happen so it's always good to take safety precautions like using an otterbox. Using a nice case also addresses another issue people complain about, the build quality. I've read it feels plastic. Throw a nice case on and problem solved. Personally, I think the build quality is outstanding with great attention to detail, rounded corners, and ever so slightly curves giving the phone another five stars for aesthetics.One other issue I've heard is the phone is too big. This is utter nonsense, really? I highly doubt they even held one in their hand. Anyone can handle this phone with ease. The only thing too big about this phone is it's massive functionality, enhanced feature rich customizing ability, and truly awe inspiring ZERO LAG performance! Put this phone in the hands of anyone for a few days and I seriously doubt they would go back to anything smaller no matter the manufacturer, performance, reputation, and superior marketing strategies. You have to think, this phone is the most sought after, must have, number one, best selling phone in the world today for good reason. Size, shape, and fell being one of them.The only drawback to this particular model is that it is an unlocked international version with remarkable LTE on a quad core smartphone. If your living in the U.S. it will only work on a GSM Carrier utilizing a micro-SIM, another 10 second installation, to have functionality. By the way, it does send and recieves calls very nicely with outstanding sound quality. Although you may never achieve 4G speeds, this in no way diminishes this phone in any way whatsoever. More than likely you will be using your private or public WIFI for data anyway. When you do need data on the go for various reasons, you will still have data speeds that will satisfy your needs.One last thing to mention, the Samsung brand is second to none when it comes to seamless integration and synchronization of various media platforms such as televisions, computers, smartphones, and the like with ease via wire or wireless WIFI. I would be awestruck if anyone could possibly utilize the many different features and variations possible with such devices. The Galaxy S3 GT-i9305 is no acception. It makes light work of synchronizing the peripheral devices. Having played around with it, I realized the possibilities of taking advantage of all the features of this incredible device are virtually unlimited.I would have compared it to it's top competitor, but seriously, who walks around with 2 phones comparing them side by side every single day? When it comes to the remarkable hardware, detailed attention to style, and the endless possibilities of its functionality...this phone has got it all. You will never find a better smartphone with more sophisticated features than this Samsung Galaxy S3 GT-i9305.

Reviews.Title: The best smartphone !!!!
Reviews.Author: JOSE MORINIGO "Waly"
Reviews.Content: Is very fast, hardly any lag whatsoever and run games and aplications smoothly. battery lasts a full day with normal use. For some it may be negative not have FM radio. There is no FM radio in the LTE version. I guess that's because you're supposed to just stream everything over the internet now.

Reviews.Title: Phone could not be better, however if you care about carrier bloatware, beware
Reviews.Author: Carlos E. L. Augusto "Sectoid"
Reviews.Content: I'll not cover the phone features here because a lot of other reviews cover this. I'll just warn you that the phone may not be factory unlocked as advertised. Also, I confirm that it's the i9305, with a quad-core processor and 2GBs of RAM.I bought this phone expecting what the title said, "factory unlocked". I even asked the seller beforehand if it indeed was, as I read a review that warned about it not being so. The seller confirmed it was factory unlocked without any carrier logo, but as it arrived, it was an orange carrier phone, with the expected bloatware and even an altered browser (which I'm skeptical to use, so I use chrome). Most of the bloatware cannot be removed without changing the firmware, but there's a way to disable it if you know which programs to look for (please tell me if you do!).The seller, FGS Trading, claimed that was not to be expected from their distributors and promptly offered a full refund plus payment for shipping charges to send it back. Also, their after-sales communication was really good, so overall I rated the store positively, even with this problem. I also chose to keep the phone, as I'm in Brazil now and I need it. Maybe when Samsung releases a software update, I can get rid of the bloatware.Bottomline: if you care about it being factory-unlocked, be prepared that it may not be or consider buying at a local store where you can see what you're getting.

Reviews.Title: Beware: French Galaxy
Reviews.Author: Soul
Reviews.Content: This phone works internationally but it is not the original international edition. It has the same specs but when I turned it on, I was greeted by Samsung logo and Orange (a French mobile company). The phone also has pre-installed French apps that cannot be deleted. I did contact the seller before ordering and they assured me it is international.. Lies.

Reviews.Title: unlocked by software
Reviews.Author: eldiego77cp
Reviews.Content: The seller sent a shipment in the right way. Just i have one thing to say. The seller sell the phone as factory unlocked. In my opinion factory unlocked means factory unlocked and not by software. If you buy a factory unlocked cel phone means the cel phone has the samsung logo and nothing else. This cel has a telekom logo from germany, it means that cel was unlocked by software and it is not a factory unlocked cel. The samsung s3 lte is excelent, works perfectly, but i d want the cel factory unlocked by samsung. However i recommend to buy the product.

Reviews.Title: Useful
Reviews.Author: jaymay
Reviews.Content: I bought this for someone who needed it to unlock a phone that was bought for him. It worked out quite well. it was nbot expensive and did the job very well.

Reviews.Title: The most powerful smartphone on the market...
Reviews.Author: ryan
Reviews.Content: I had a I9300 and loved it but I broke it so when I learned of the this model,(equipped with quad core exynos and 2gs of ram to boot), I was thrilled. I'm in Canada and am unable to receive 4g and LTE data speeds. I do not understand why, because the frequencies are supposed to be compatible. This is a minor quibble since I rarely require the use of data outside a wifi connection. Awesome phone. Absolutely s***s on Apple in my humble opinion.

Reviews.Title: Batterly life last "full day"? Humbug! Unless your day is only 10 hours.
Reviews.Author: M. Nagll "fitness freak"
Reviews.Content: I've had this baby for about 4 weeks now. Features are great. Bluetooth is excellent. Network connection excellent. Touch sensitivity of the screen and clarity is awesome. Stability of the software as well. The only thing that keeps annoying the crap out of me is the battery life. So much that I regret getting it. Unfortunately, I bought it in the United Arab Emirates, where return policies for electronics is pure fiction.I am only running Skype and Google Talk in addition to the standard programs, and the maximum stand-by time I am able to achieve (e.g. with no use whatsoever) is just 11 hours. That is with both wi-fi and mobile data active. For someone who travels frequently and works long hours, this is far from good enough as a portable mobile work-horse!In comparison, the Blackberry BOLD 9900 my employer has supplied me with (which was known for poor battery capacity compared to earlier blackberry versions) lasts at least 18 hours. And the Galaxy Note was using before (I gave it to my wife when I bought the S3 LTE - big regret) held it up for at least 24 hours on standby. And the Galaxy Tab 2 7' (which gave to my mum, expecting that the S3 would be enough) lasted an amazing two days (wi-fi only).I am now considering getting the Note 2, without LTE. Unless some other reviewer has a better suggestion?

Reviews.Title: Reason for why I didn't return the phone.
Reviews.Author: Kifle Mereto
Reviews.Content: Because the item is not  match to my expectation. It is 2g(i.e E) internet band width for any service provider in USA. When I try to return it, the company notified me via email up to 50% of my payment will be deduct. Even the item is neat as I received, I can't be sure whether the company expctation is above or bellow  the actual condition of the item. In short I don't to loose $200.00 for 4G.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: The charger was not Amrican
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: The phone is good, and arrived in time.But the charger was European I think.. I don't know, but I have to use me I-pad charger to charge it...

Reviews.Title: Just about everything that i expected.
Reviews.Author: Unplugged "Unplugged"
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my son in-law.  After 3 weeks of usage, he is tickled pink!  The phone met , even surpassed all of his expectations.  It still does not make coffee for him in the morning but I guess that will come with time - as soon as the coffee machine makers figure out how to connect their contraptions to the next generation phones.  I think that the manufacturers of these phone things should provide them with more protective cases so as to eliminate the need for all the peripherals that abound.

Reviews.Title: A Piece Of Cr@p
Reviews.Author: wonka
Reviews.Content: in 6 months the screen suddently goes blue and dies... just like that! no reason!it's big screen is sure flashy but the plastic body and poor components don't worth a dime!

Reviews.Title: Good one.
Reviews.Author: Henry
Reviews.Content: Excellent, but no 1900 MHZ band, very good alternative to standard S3, keep in sight the 1900MHZ lack.very pleased.

Reviews.Title: The battery sucks
Reviews.Author: Dominique E.
Reviews.Content: I really like the phone itself. It operates fine however the battery takes 12 hours to fully charge so I spend more time charging it than enjoying the features.

Reviews.Title: Billed as new, showed up in open box
Reviews.Author: Hisham A Mohamed
Reviews.Content: I bought from these guys because they had good reviews and a decent price. However, I was surprised that the phone showed up in an open box, despite being billed as new (I confirmed this before buying). The battery was not in its original wrapper (making me wonder if it's a genuine or after market battery), and I'm not sure if I have all the normal items included when buying this phone new. I'm diappointed because I now have to go through the whole return process which, no matter how easy, is going to be a big waste of my time. I really don't like misleading sellers.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Phone
Reviews.Author: FedeJRA
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone from My Wish List. Everything works perfect. No carrier pre installed software, the phone is factory unlocked as described. The only issue I have was related to the color. The one requested was Grey and I received a Pebble Blue that for me is not so nice. I had no chance to return it since was on US on hollidays.

Reviews.Title: I am disappointed from the seller!!!
Reviews.Author: Sonja
Reviews.Content: The cell phone is great, but I  ordered grey color, and I've got the black one. I am so disappointed  :-(((

Reviews.Title: Good Seller...
Reviews.Author: Rb
Reviews.Content: Seller shipped quickly and phone has thus far been to expectations.Just keep in mind that this is the International version and you may have to change the language in the phone's settings to English.The unit I got was set to French but it's simple correct.So far so good,will update if anything.

Reviews.Title: It is not factory unlocked !
Reviews.Author: Valdair F Pinto
Reviews.Content: It is a good phone but the statement that it is factory unlocked is not true. The phone was originally prepared by Orange a French provider, It comes with Orange logo and a number of apps from the provider that we cannot uninstall. If I knew it beforehand I would have not bought it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent service from CELLPHONESHOP
Reviews.Author: Subhan Bashirli
Reviews.Content: Excellent device. Very nice screen effects. Nice features. It's just a little too big to hold in hand... But I guess I'm getting used to it. Very nice product overall.

Reviews.Title: Great Samsung GS3
Reviews.Author: Cleber
Reviews.Content: The best cell phone I've had! The color (titanium gray) is great! So fast and the battery life is good. I recomend this cell phone for those who likes technology.

Reviews.Title: Great phone with many features, iphone killer maybe, LTE and NFC a big plus
Reviews.Author: Jason Malamut
Reviews.Content: I like having the option of customizing my phone. I don't need many apps or fancy wallpapers. I am a minimalist. The phone has a steep learning curve, but once you find you way around, you realize how helpful some of these things are.My only concern, which was my fault, is that since this is the international LTE version, i do not know if the LTE frequency bands will get picked up on this phone in the States. If it doesnt, hey its still a great phone and this one also has 2gb of RAM. Not a bad deal.

Reviews.Title: USA RESIDENTS: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Srinivasu Uppuluri
Reviews.Content: The Reviews and descriptions were singing praises and I made the mistake of ordering it...When I Power up this device, it starts with a TMobile banner...The reviews said that this will work in the US...Here is the CRUX of the Issue: This does NOT WORK on the Tmobile Data Network...I Took a plan to get Unlimited 4G data & This works only on 2G EDGE network...very slow & Horrible...I was losing a lot of calls on the TMobile Network.... and when I contacted TMobile Customer support, they tell me that since I didnt buy the phone from TMobile, it will not work on 3g/4g network.All these businesses are scum bags, who dont educate their customers & give them cock & bull stories and make them buy Devices &  a ton of services, SO THEY CAN MAKE MONEYI NEED TO RETURN THIS ITEM

Reviews.Title: Magnífico!!!
Reviews.Author: AA
Reviews.Content: Rapido, preciso, excelente cada parte del producto y cada servicio que presta. Lejos... el mejor celular que haya tenido. Lo recomiendo al producto!

Reviews.Title: never arrived
Reviews.Author: ioanae
Reviews.Content: the product never arrived, after few days after shipping i couldnt see the progress on ups, FGS responded to all my messages, and they gave me all my money back, i was told i was going to get a discount on my next order but it never happened, despite that the atention was very good.

Reviews.Title: Great Smartphone is unlocked and I can used it in my country
Reviews.Author: joeccs
Reviews.Content: Great smartphone, I have it since May 2013 and is like new. Is unlocked, that is great but you have to check the network bands because is not going to work with all cellphone companies. My i9305 originally comes from France (Orange) but thats not a problem, only have a few apps preinstalled.The color grey looks good.Excelente teléfono, lo tengo desde mayo de 2013 y luce como nuevo. Está desbloqueado pero debes chequear las bandas de 3G (en Venezuela solo lo pude usar en digitel). El teléfono es original de Francia, pero no es ningún problema, solo trae algunas aplicaciones preinstaladas y listo. El color gris me gusta  mucho.

Reviews.Title: amazing phone
Reviews.Author: alex Dahik
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, yes the battery does not last long but the phone its amazing and suuuper fast i defenetly recommend this phone to anyone

Reviews.Title: Good product but who will not buy it
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: very good product very fast. recommend but careful who you buy than "CELL PHONE" (New Generation Products LLC.,) the best smartphone
